alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:11AM PST until January 29 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing and drifting snow will cause reductions to visibility and hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
